name: SkeleRun v1.1
description:
Here's a re-upload of the project since the last one didn't work!

The submitted file has the test field, but no achievable objectives, so there's no way to win! Also there's no way to pick up keys, interact with graves, switch to the different types of special bones, and the level generator crashes the game. . . it's a mess, haha

SkeleRun was planned to be a level based pseudo-roguelike where you play as a skeleton that is being chased by dogs, and the only way to get past them is to throw your own bones.

Here's a short video of what we had at the time of submission:


It's pretty cool to see the pathfinding and trajectories as well:
